_xResult.title: Switzerland Black Evening Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made elegant black dress with dual-pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
Once you buy your first Aiste design, you'll be hooked. She is a true artisan and works with high quality and sustainable fabrics. In order to add more structure and visual interest to the linen fabric, it's first stitched with intricate textures. Then the garment is produced specific to your measurements so that it perfectly fits you and your curves.

 

Note that the textured square lines on the bodice of this custom made linen dress streamline your top half, and the cross-hatch texture pattern on the bottom adds weight and flow. You'll draw every eye when you walk into a room, along the sea shore, or even just down the street to the market.

 

If you've never experienced having a dress made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
